<small>Hebrew form: [[H0857]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֲתָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֲתָא‎</span> **verb** ==come== (Biblical Hebrew poetry  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָתָה‎</span>; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎את‎</span> Haph\`el Lab<sup>230</sup>, Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex</sup>.); — 

**Pe\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֲתָה‎</span> [[Ezra.5.3|Ezra 5:3]]; [[Dan.7.22|Dan 7:22]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אָ֯‎</span> [[Ezra.5.16|Ezra 5:16]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֲתוֺ‎</span> [[Ezra.4.12|Ezra 4:12]] ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎(וֶ)אֱתוֺ‎</span> [[Dan.3.26|Dan 3:26]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְמֵתֵא‎</span> ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 41 c</sup>)) v[[Dan.3.2|Dan 3:2]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אָתֵה‎</span> [[Dan.7.13|Dan 7:13]] — ***come***, with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עַל‎</span> person [[Ezra.4.12|Ezra 4:12]] (+ location), [[Ezra.5.3|Ezra 5:3]] with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> of thing [[Dan.3.2|Dan 3:2]] absolute v[[Dan.3.26|Dan 3:26]]; [[Dan.7.13|Dan 7:13]]; [[Dan.7.22|Dan 7:22]] followed by finite verb active [[Ezra.5.16|Ezra 5:16]]. **Haph\`el** ***bring***: ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הַיְתִי‎</span>, ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>l.c</sup>.), [[Dan.5.13|Dan 5:13]] (accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מִן‎</span> local); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הַיְתִיו‎</span>, accusative of thing [[Dan.5.3|Dan 5:3]], so (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> accusative) v[[Dan.5.23|Dan 5:23]] (+ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קֳדָס‎</span> person), [[Dan.6.17|Dan 6:17]] (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> accusative of person), v.[[Dan.6.25|Dan 6:25]] (accusative of person); ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְהַיְתָיָה‎</span> (so Egyptian Aramaic RES<sup>361 C</sup>) [[Dan.3.13|Dan 3:13]] (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> accusative of person), [[Dan.5.2|Dan 5:2]] (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> accusative of thing). **Hephal** (passive, [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>l.c</sup>.) ***be brought: Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הֵיתַ֫יִת‎</span> ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 47, Beisp. 6</sup>, [[BDB#W|W]]<sup>CG 225</sup>) subject of thing [[Dan.6.18|Dan 6:18]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הֵיתַ֫יוּ‎</span> subject person [[Dan.3.13|Dan 3:13]] (+ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קֳדָם‎</span> person). 

<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אָת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוה‎</span>.
